profile.summary:
🚀 AI Developer | LLMs | Full-Stack Engineer | Generative AI Enthusiast

I'm a pre-final year student at DTU who's already deep in the AI game. From building detection and segmentation models 🧠 to deploying my own nano-GPT for Shakespearean verse generation 🎭, I believe in learning by building.

🛠️ Interned at DraftAI (fine-tuned LLMs using HuggingFace) & SUNIC Tech (container ID recognition under CONCOR). Researched ML for smart waste segregation at IIT Delhi.

🤖 Deeply passionate about GenAI — built RAG systems, fine-tuned LLMs, and created intelligent AI agents. Projects like LegalEase & OpenAPI Spec Generator showcase my ability to turn cutting-edge models into real-world tools.

📱 Built LegalEase – auto-generates legal docs from minimal input. Also crafted an OpenAPI spec generator for any CRM (Gemini Long Context Challenge 🧩).

💻 Full-stack dev with scraping/automation tools using Selenium, Playwright & BeautifulSoup. Backend magic with Flask, Express, NodeJS; frontend skills in HTML/CSS/JS.

⚡ Also worked with Kafka for distributed streaming, Docker for deployments & Rust for high-performance modules. All about scalable, efficient engineering.

📈 Currently building a startup in AI – collaborated with Langchain’s cofounder, contributed to CrewAI, and growing fast.

Let’s connect & build something epic! 🌐

key_activities.content:
🚀 Hiring for a short-term paid collaboration!
I’m looking for someone to work with me at SCAILE Technologies on a short-term project (2-3 weeks). This is a paid opportunity and could potentially lead to future roles.
🔍 Looking for someone with:
>Hands-on experience in browser automation
>Proficiency in both JavaScript and Python
>Experience with Playwright (Selenium/Puppeteer also acceptable)
>Familiarity with AI agents beyond just chatbot frameworks – actual tools and orchestration
>Familiarity with browser-use is a big plus

🚀 Just launched: Open_PDF2Brainrot — The Free, Open‑Source PDF→Brainrot Converter! 
Exams are approaching fast , and I wanted to try the viral PDF to Brainrot microlearning technique. But all the popular tools? Behind steep paywalls. 💸
So… I decided to build my own; and I’m sharing it with everyone. Say hello to: Open_PDF2Brainrot 🎉
What it does:
 ✅ Upload any PDF
 ✅ Auto‑generate clean, structured JSON flashcards 📑
 ✅ Turn them into short, punchy Brainrot videos 🎥
 ✅ Browse everything in a slick, responsive web UI 🌐
 ✅ Navigate flashcards + videos like a social feed 🔁
Tech Stack: Python, Django, PyPDF2, MoviePy, Vosk, Gemini API.

I’m happy to share that I’m starting a new position as an AI Agent Engineering & Marketing Communications Intern at New Native! Excited to get to work alongside the team at the lablab.ai platform. 💫 ✨
Thrilled to share that I got selected to attend the Research and Innovation Symposium in Computing (RISC 2025) at Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay organized by CSE at IIT Bombay.

🚀 Leveraging Gemini's Long Context Window to Revolutionize OpenAPI Specification Generation 🎉
Excited to share my submission for the Google Long Context Competition on Kaggle! In this project, I explored how Generative AI, powered by Gemini's long-context capabilities, can streamline the creation of OpenAPI specifications for CRMs. My approach focused on Context Caching, Many-Shot Prompting, and In-Context Retrieval to automatically generate OpenAPI specs from existing API documentation, dramatically improving accuracy and speed.

It was a rewarding experience indeed🌟! I learned a lot throughout the Amazon ML Challenge, and it was exciting to see our approach stand out among LLM-based solutions. We ranked 135th out of 700,000+ participants by developing a model without using any LLM, achieving 50.4% accuracy on a classification task from 130,000 images. Despite hurdles, we pushed through and gained valuable insights, making the journey truly worthwhile.
